text:
Welcome to howtocookthat.net I am ANn Reardon
and today we are looking at how to make skin

To make skin colour what you will need is
some pink about half the amount of pale green,

half the amount again of yellow and half the
amount again of a pale blue and then we'll
just mix all of those together.
And there you have a nice skin colour.

If you want a darker more tanned skin colour
then you'll need to mix all of those colours

more intensely so a brighter yellow, brighter
pink and a brighter blue and a brighter green.
